attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
who died and made you god?.............apart from blair?

tony has no right to force unelected prime minister on the population.we voted for him for better or for worse.not you.

democracy has ceased to exist in the uk

resign and call a general election if you are man enough.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
